nodes.id: 湖北省汉江中级人民法院

zh-cn: 湖北省汉江中级人民法院

location.zh-cn: 湖北省仙桃市黄金大道西段9号

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖北省的一所中级人民法院，直接隶属于湖北省高级人民法院管理，辖区范围为天门、潜江、仙桃三个省直管市。
description.en: An intermediate people's court in Hubei Province, People's Republic of China, directly subordinate to the Hubei Provincial High People's Court. Its jurisdiction covers the three provincially administered cities of Tianmen, Qianjiang, and Xiantao.

description.zh-cn: 时任湖北省汉江中级人民法院院长。
description.en: Serving as the President of the Hubei Provincial Hanjiang Intermediate People's Court.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖北省的高级人民法院。
description.en: The High People's Court of Hubei Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 湖北省的地方国家权力机关。
description.en: The local state power organ of Hubei Province.

nodes.id: 湖北省人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 湖北省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 湖北省人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The standing committee of the Hubei Provincial People's Congress.

nodes.id: 中国共产党湖北省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党湖北省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在湖北省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Chinese Communist Party in Hubei Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国设立于地级行政区的中级审判机关的一种类别。
description.en: A category of intermediate judicial organs established in prefecture-level administrative regions of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的根本大法，规定了国家机构的组织和活动原则。
description.en: The fundamental law of the People's Republic of China, which stipulates the organization and principles of activity of state organs.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国人民法院组织法

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国人民法院组织法

description.zh-cn: 规定中华人民共和国人民法院的设置、组织、职权和工作制度的法律。
description.en: The law that provides for the establishment, organization, powers, and working systems of the people's courts of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高审判机关。
description.en: The highest judicial organ of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 负责中国共产党和国家机构改革、行政体制改革和机构编制管理工作的中共中央议事协调机构。
description.en: A deliberation and coordination body of the Central Committee of the CCP responsible for the reform of Party and state institutions, administrative system reform, and institutional organization management.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国务院国有资产监督管理委员会主任。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Director of the State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission of the State Council.

nodes.id: 国务院国有资产监督管理委员会

zh-cn: 国务院国有资产监督管理委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的特设直属机构，代表国家履行出资人职责。
description.en: A special commission directly under the State Council of the People's Republic of China, which performs the responsibilities of a contributor on behalf of the state.

nodes.id: 湖北省天门市人民法院

zh-cn: 湖北省天门市人民法院

description.zh-cn: 湖北省汉江中级人民法院对应的基层人民法院之一。
description.en: One of the basic people's courts corresponding to the Hubei Provincial Hanjiang Intermediate People's Court.

nodes.id: 湖北省潜江市人民法院

zh-cn: 湖北省潜江市人民法院

description.zh-cn: 湖北省汉江中级人民法院对应的基层人民法院之一。
description.en: One of the basic people's courts corresponding to the Hubei Provincial Hanjiang Intermediate People's Court.

nodes.id: 湖北省仙桃市人民法院

zh-cn: 湖北省仙桃市人民法院

description.zh-cn: 湖北省汉江中级人民法院对应的基层人民法院之一。
description.en: One of the basic people's courts corresponding to the Hubei Provincial Hanjiang Intermediate People's Court.

relationships.target: 湖北省汉江中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 根据信息框，闫小龙是湖北省汉江中级人民法院的院长。
description.en: According to the infobox, Yan Xiaolong is the President of the Hubei Provincial Hanjiang Intermediate People's Court.

relationships.source: 湖北省汉江中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 湖北省汉江中级人民法院的上诉法院和业务上级是湖北省高级人民法院，并直接隶属于其管理。
description.en: The appellate court and professional superior of the Hubei Provincial Hanjiang Intermediate People's Court is the Hubei Provincial High People's Court, to which it is directly subordinate.

relationships.source: 湖北省汉江中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 湖北省汉江中级人民法院的组织上级是湖北省人民代表大会，并受其监督。
description.en: The organizational superior of the Hubei Provincial Hanjiang Intermediate People's Court is the Hubei Provincial People's Congress, and it is supervised by it.

relationships.source: 湖北省汉江中级人民法院
relationships.target: 湖北省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 湖北省汉江中级人民法院的组织上级是湖北省人民代表大会常务委员会。
description.en: The organizational superior of the Hubei Provincial Hanjiang Intermediate People's Court is the Standing Committee of the Hubei Provincial People's Congress.

relationships.source: 湖北省汉江中级人民法院
relationships.target: 中国共产党湖北省委员会

description.zh-cn: 湖北省汉江中级人民法院的中共上级是中国共产党湖北省委员会。
description.en: The superior CCP organization of the Hubei Provincial Hanjiang Intermediate People's Court is the Hubei Provincial Committee of the Chinese Communist Party.

relationships.target: 湖北省汉江中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 《中华人民共和国宪法》是湖北省汉江中级人民法院的授权法源。
description.en: The Constitution of the People's Republic of China is the authorizing legal source for the Hubei Provincial Hanjiang Intermediate People's Court.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国人民法院组织法
relationships.target: 湖北省汉江中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 《中华人民共和国人民法院组织法》是湖北省汉江中级人民法院的组织法规。
description.en: The Organic Law of the People's Courts of the People's Republic of China is the organizational statute for the Hubei Provincial Hanjiang Intermediate People's Court.

relationships.target: 湖北省汉江中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 湖北省汉江中级人民法院的设立得到了最高人民法院的同意。
description.en: The establishment of the Hubei Provincial Hanjiang Intermediate People's Court was approved by the Supreme People's Court.

relationships.target: 湖北省汉江中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 中央机构编制委员会于1999年10月18日批准设立湖北省汉江中级人民法院。
description.en: The Central Organization Establishment Committee approved the establishment of the Hubei Provincial Hanjiang Intermediate People's Court on October 18, 1999.

relationships.source: 湖北省汉江中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 湖北省汉江中级人民法院审理了原国务院国有资产监督管理委员会主任蒋洁敏受贿、巨额财产来源不明案。
description.en: The Hubei Provincial Hanjiang Intermediate People's Court tried the case of Jiang Jiemin, former Director of the State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission, for bribery and having a huge amount of property with unidentified sources.

relationships.target: 国务院国有资产监督管理委员会

description.zh-cn: 蒋洁敏曾担任国务院国有资产监督管理委员会主任。
description.en: Jiang Jiemin served as the Director of the State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission of the State Council.

relationships.source: 湖北省天门市人民法院
relationships.target: 湖北省汉江中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 湖北省天门市人民法院是湖北省汉江中级人民法院对应的基层人民法院。
description.en: The Tianmen People's Court of Hubei Province is a basic people's court corresponding to the Hubei Provincial Hanjiang Intermediate People's Court.

relationships.source: 湖北省潜江市人民法院
relationships.target: 湖北省汉江中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 湖北省潜江市人民法院是湖北省汉江中级人民法院对应的基层人民法院。
description.en: The Qianjiang People's Court of Hubei Province is a basic people's court corresponding to the Hubei Provincial Hanjiang Intermediate People's Court.

relationships.source: 湖北省仙桃市人民法院
relationships.target: 湖北省汉江中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 湖北省仙桃市人民法院是湖北省汉江中级人民法院对应的基层人民法院。
description.en: The Xiantao People's Court of Hubei Province is a basic people's court corresponding to the Hubei Provincial Hanjiang Intermediate People's Court.
